an3.119:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco panatipati hoti …pe… samphappalapi hoti.
an3.119:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchaajivo hoti, micchaajivena jivikam kappeti.
an3.119:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchaditthiko hoti viparitadassano:
an3.119:3.3: ‘natthi dinnam, natthi yittham …pe… ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti.
an3.119:4.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco panatipata pativirato hoti …pe… samphappalapa pativirato hoti.
an3.119:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammaajivo hoti, sammaajivena jivikam kappeti.
an3.119:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammaditthiko hoti aviparitadassano:
an3.119:6.3: ‘atthi dinnam, atthi yittham …pe… ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti.
